Text:
Jitter on moving scenes for me!
Not encoded properly?

Maybe the cause is from the long path of encoding it from VHS to DVD, (ripped to hard drive first)  then to Divx (from DVD) I know the quality is poor (what isn't when ripping from VHS??) but I cannot explain the jitters. Maybe somebody has an original DVD (I've seen them on eBay & Amazon fetching upwards of $250 !!!) that would be willing to rip to Divx. This is all I've got......
It looks like it has been re-released. It is on Play UK for ÂŁ6.99. Enjoy :-)
Intriguing film. Congratulations partsguyx, keep up the good work and thanks a lot.
